meanings.definition: Live together as a couple without being married.
meanings.sent1: They are cohabiting in a small apartment.
meanings.sent2: John and Mary are cohabiting in the same house.
meanings.sent3: The two cats are cohabiting in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The birds and squirrels are cohabiting in the trees.
meanings.sent5: The students are cohabiting in the dormitory during the semester.

meanings.definition: To reside with another as if married.
meanings.sent1: The elderly couple is cohabiting in their retirement home.
meanings.sent2: She and her best friend are cohabiting in the city.
meanings.sent3: The siblings are cohabiting in their childhood home.
meanings.sent4: The neighbors are cohabiting in harmony on the same street.
meanings.sent5: The roommates are cohabiting peacefully in their shared apartment.
